scripts.build-production-windows: npm run clean && npm run refresh && npm run build-android
scripts.build-production-mac: npm run clean && npm run refresh && npm run build-android && npm run build-ios
scripts.build-dev-windows: npm run refresh-dev && cordova build android
scripts.build-dev-mac: npm run refresh-dev && cordova build android && cordova build ios
scripts.refresh: npm install --production && bower install --production && ionic resources android && ionic resources ios && cordova prepare && grunt
scripts.refresh-dev: npm install && bower install && ionic resources android && ionic resources ios && cordova prepare && grunt
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ platforms/ plugins/ resources/android/ resources/ios/ www/lib/ www/dist/
scripts.web: npm install && bower install && grunt && ionic serve
